title: JSON Schema for base_settings
description: Meltano (https://meltano.com) is an open source platform for building, running & orchestrating ELT pipelines

aliases.description: Alternative setting names that can be used in 'meltano.yml' and 'meltano config set'

label.description: A user friendly label for the setting

value.description: The default value of this setting if not otherwise defined

placeholder.description: A placeholder value for this setting

kind.description: The type of value this setting contains

description.description: A description for what this setting does
examples: The unique account identifier for your Stripe Account

tooltip.description: A phrase to provide additional information on this setting

documentation.description: A link to documentation on this setting

env.description: An environment variable that will be initialized with the setting's value whenever the plugin is invoked. This is used to inject environment variables into the plugin's execution context. If the named environment variable is already defined at runtime, Meltano will use the passed value from context instead of the configured value.

value_processor.description: Used with `kind: object` to process the keys in a particular way.

value_post_processor.description: Used with `kind: object` to process the keys in a particular way.

provider.description: The name of a Meltano-supported OAuth provider

label.description: A user friendly label describing the plugin

value.description: The defined value of the option.

docs.description: A URL to the documentation for this plugin

hidden.description: A hidden setting should not be user-configurable

sensitive.description: A sensitive setting is redacted in command output
